item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
Iâ€™m not a big fan of the genre usually, but this is a great song. I love the melody and chords you used. I do think you should invest in some fancier artwork tools however (no offense), Iâ€™d recommend using Trigraphy to edit pictures and Over to add text, both of which are on the Apple App Store.

item.title: DJ La Rocca - Aural Flux [Progressive House]
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Hey thanks for the input. The low pass was actually full.

Umm the basses I used were beam with low pass on low and full tone. And pepper with full tone, shape and little to no low pass.

I have done a video on progressive House which u can visit on my YouTube channel or check the Auxy tutorial thread

Read full topic
item.source: DJ La Rocca - Aural Flux [Progressive House]

item.title: DJ La Rocca - Aural Flux [Progressive House]
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
I really like the chords and drums! This is the kind of genre Iâ€™ve been working outside of Auxy! I need to get more drum samples like the ones Iâ€™ve heard from Auxy Premium for my non-Auxy work.

Just a suggestion - I feel like the piano is a bit sharp sounding, maybe turn up the lowpass filter?

Also if you donâ€™t mind me asking - since this is the genre I write outside of Auxy and I havenâ€™t been as successful inside Auxy, do you have any tips for Auxy Progressive House? Iâ€™ve struggled to get a good gritty bass like you did, it sounds kinda like gravel?

Read full topic
